title: Marc Fosh's easy pizza with tomato, mozzarella and fresh basil recipe
description:
Marc Fosh's tip

Sun dried tomato pesto is a variation on traditional green pesto. Why not try it with pasta, smeared on bruschetta or brushed on a chicken before roasting?

This dish was prepared using the Braun Multiquick 5 hand blender with its Compact Kitchen Machine with kneading hook and chopper accessory.
